name: UpdateJournalInZohoBooks
description:
Updates a journal entry in Zoho Books with specified details.

This tool updates an existing journal entry in Zoho Books using the provided details. It should be called when a user needs to modify a journal entry in their Zoho Books account.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization in Zoho Books. Required for identifying which organization's journal entry to update.

parameters.name: journal_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the journal entry to be updated in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: journal_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing all update details for the journal, including dates, reference numbers, notes, VAT information, line items, etc.

journal_date.description: Date on which the journal to be recorded.

journal_type.description: Type of the Journal. Allowed values: Cash and Both .

vat_treatment.description: (Optional) VAT treatment for the journals. VAT treatment denotes the location of the customer, if the customer resides in UK then the VAT treatment is uk. If the customer is in an EU country & VAT registered, you are resides in Northen Ireland and selling Goods then his VAT treatment is eu_vat_registered, if he resides outside of the UK then his VAT treatment is overseas (For Pre Brexit, this can be split as eu_vat_registered, eu_vat_not_registered and non_eu).

include_in_vat_return.description: Check if Journal should be included in VAT Return

product_type.description: Type of the journal. This denotes whether the journal is to be treated as goods or service. Allowed Values: digital_service, goods and service.

is_bas_adjustment.description: Check if Journal is created for BAS Adjustment

currency_id.description: ID of the Currency Associated with the Journal

account_id.description: ID of account for which journals to be recorded.

description.description: Description that can be given at the line item level.

tax_exemption_type.description: Type of the Tax Exemption. Allowed Values : customer and item

amount.description: Amount to be recorded for the journal.

debit_or_credit.description: Whether the accounts needs to be debited or credited. Allowed Values: debit and credit.

acquisition_vat_id.description: (Optional) This is the ID of the tax applied in case this is an EU - goods journal and acquisition VAT needs to be reported.

reverse_charge_vat_id.description: (Optional) This is the ID of the tax applied in case this is a non UK - service journal and reverse charge VAT needs to be reported.

tax_exemption_type.description: Type of the Tax Exemption. Allowed Values : customer and item

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.
